mapper.select: select c.cus_name , a.animal_name, r.rsvt_time, r.service_type, r.doctor_name, r.animal_num, r.rsvt_dt from customer c, animal a, reservation r where c.cus_tel=a.cus_tel and c.cus_tel in (select cus_tel from animal where animal_num in (select animal_num from reservation)) and a.animal_num=r.animal_num and r.rsvt_dt=#{todate} order by r.rsvt_time

mapper.select: select a.animal_name, r.DOCTOR_NAME, r.SERVICE_TYPE from animal a, reservation r where a.animal_num=r.animal_num and counter_state='o' and a.animal_num=r.animal_num and a.animal_num in (select animal_num from reservation where counter_state='o' and jinryo_state='x' and rsvt_dt=#{today}) order by r.COUNTER_DATE_TIME
